狛字的基本解释

狛
bó
古书上说的一种似狼而有角的野兽：“扼土狛，殪天狗。”

狛字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pò］
［《集韻》匹各切，入鐸，滂。］
动物名。状似狼。

狛字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【犬字部】　狛； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页709第16
【廣韻】【集韻】?匹各切，音粕。【說文】如狼，善驅羊。从犬，白聲，讀若蘖。甯嚴?讀若泊。　又【集韻】伯各切，音博。又筆戟切，音碧。又步化切，音?。義?同。　【集韻】或作?。

狛字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
狛字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Brow
bó
An ancient book said a wolf-like beast with horns: "The stubborn dog, the tengu."

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［pò］
["Ji Yun" each cuts each, enters the duo, and feels unhappy. ]
Animal names. Looks like a wolf.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Part Two] [Dog Character Department] 　狛; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 709 16
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Each piece is cut, sound meal. [Speaking text] Like a wolf, good at driving sheep. From the dog, the white sound, read Ruoyu. Ning Yan? Read Ruobo.　[Jiyun] Bogeqie, Yinbo. Another halberd cut, Yinbi. Step by step, sound?. Righteous? Same.　【Jiyun】or make?.
